name: VALORANT
summary: VALORANT, the competitive, 5v5 character-based tactical shooter built by Riot Games, is getting a closed beta starting April 7. We're ready for the first wave of players to test VALORANT's competitive gameplay and take our first step toward building a global community.
info:
• 开发: Riot Games
  • 发行: Riot Games
  • 别名: 特戰英豪
  • 别名: 无畏契约
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年6月2日
  • 售价: Free
